question:
Which of the following are the objectives of National Innovations on Climate Resilient Agriculture?
1) Strategic research
2) Technology demonstrations 
3) Capacity building
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
National Innovations on Climate Resilient Agriculture was launched in 2011 by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research. The prime objectives of NICRA are:
1) Strategic research
2) Technology demonstrations 
3) Capacity building
